sys_remote_update_set.description:
From: "Ganapathy, Ram K" <RKGanapathy@verisk.com> Date: Monday, October 23, 2017 at 10:05 AM To: "Vora, Hardik" <hjvora@verisk.com> Cc: "Gnanasekaran, Balaji" <bgnanasekaran@verisk.com> Subject: RE: Xactware server errors
Hi Hardik,
In servicenow, when the Incidents are assigned to IT Operations, it sends email notification to #ITOps Team Leads itopsteamleads@verisk.com. Can you change the email id/group to #ITOPS Servicenow Notification ITOPSServicenowNotification@verisk.com
Thanks, Ram
Ram Kumar Ganapathy, ITIL Foundation| Incident Manager
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Change Xactware IT Ops email address
